Name: Elizabeth
description:
Elizabeth is forty years old. She is happily married and with a supportive family.

She deals in scrap metals which she buys and resells for re-use. This helps keep the environment clean and this impacts the community positively. Her job has also helped create employment for those who go collecting the scrap metal for her.

She is kindly requesting a loan that will help her to boost her business and she is committed to repaying her loan using the profits she makes.

Her dream is to own her own company that will be inherited by her family in the future.
